subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Khadevis Robinson, who was entered in an 800 heat Saturday in preparation for Sunday’s final, is the United States’ most productive 800-meter runner since Johnny Gray in the 1980s and 1990s.
snippet: Khadevis Robinson, who was entered in an 800 heat Saturday in preparation for Sunday’s final, is the United States’ most productive 800-meter runner since Johnny Gray in the 1980s and 1990s.
